basics.name: Josh McCall
basics.summary: I love working with passionate people who love what they do. I am a software engineer whose focus is helping others through the use of technology.  I enjoy connecting people with technology, no matter the platform.

highlights: Pioneer: Cloud-based data aggregation providing agricultural insights.
- AWS, Docker, Python, Angular.
John Deere: Farmer focused portal for managing operations
- AWS, Scala, NodeJS, React, Backbone.
Meredith Corporation: Custom  "Quick Apps" for bhg.com, rachaelray.com, parents.com etc.
- JS, Angular, CSS/SASS, Custom CMS, Drupal, Java, JSP.
Seneca Tank:
- PHP, Zend framework, Vagrant, Docker, Jenkins.
Adventureland: Ticket sales and processing. Multi-factor 3D bar code scanning.
- PHP, Magento, Python, Django, Perl.
